info.name: DocsAI API v1
info.description:
Postman collection for DocsAI (contact360/docsai).

**Base URL**: {{base_url}}
**Local**: http://127.0.0.1:8000

**Routing note**: This project currently mounts the REST API directly at `/api/v1/` (it does NOT mount the `apps.api` gateway at `/api/*`).

**Authentication**: Most `/api/v1/` endpoints are public; many `/docs/api/*` endpoints may require session login.

## REST API v1 (mounted)
- **Health**: root, health, database, cache, storage.
- **Docs/meta**: `/api/v1/docs/endpoint-stats/`.
- **Pages, Endpoints, Relationships, Postman**: list, filters, detail, sub-resources.
- **Dashboard**: paginated lists.

## Documentation internal JSON APIs (mounted)
- **Statistics** (`/docs/api/statistics/`)
- **Dashboard** (`/docs/api/dashboard/`) including graph

**Counts**: 98 GET endpoints under `/api/v1/` plus additional JSON endpoints under `/docs/api/*`.

item.name: Dashboard
item.description:
Dashboard API: paginated list endpoints for pages, endpoints, relationships, postman with filters and search.

Note: list endpoints return summary items by default. Use `?expand=full` to return full documents per item.

query.description: Optional. Set to `full` to return full documents per item; default returns summary list items.
Optional. Set to `full` to return full documents per item; default returns summary list items.

item.name: Documentation internal APIs
item.description: Statistics and dashboard graph (login required). Replaces removed /api/v1/ format, statistics, types, graph endpoints. Base path: /docs/api/.

item.name: Health Check
item.description: Health check and service info endpoints (no authentication required).

item.name: REST API v1 - Endpoints
item.description: REST API v1 - Endpoints API: list, by-api-version, by-method, by-state, by-lambda, and endpoint detail with sub-resources.

query.description: Optional. Set to `full` to return full documents per item; default returns summary list items.

item.name: REST API v1 - Pages
item.description: REST API v1 - Pages API: list, by-type, by-state, by user type, and page detail with sub-resources.

item.name: Base CRUD
item.description: Base list and get operations for pages.

query.description: Optional. Set to `full` to return full documents per item; default returns summary list items.

item.name: Category - By Type
item.description: Category endpoints filtered by page type.

item.name: Category - By User Type
item.description: Category endpoints filtered by user type (access control).

item.name: Page Detail (sub-resources)
item.description: Page sub-resources (access-control, sections, components, endpoints, versions).

item.name: REST API v1 - Postman
item.description: REST API v1 - Postman API: list, by-state, detail, collection, environments, mappings, test-suites, access-control.

query.description: Optional. Set to `full` to return full documents per item; default returns summary list items.

item.name: REST API v1 - Relationships
item.description: REST API v1 - Relationships API: list, usage-types, usage-contexts, by-page, by-endpoint, by-usage-type, by-usage-context, by-state, by-lambda, performance, detail and sub-resources.

query.description: Optional. Set to `full` to return full documents per item; default returns summary list items.
